original_text: But Rehoboam did not agree with their advice. Instead he talked to some younger men. They had been his friends since they were young and now they were his advisors.
korean_text: 왕이 노인들이 자문하는 것을 버리고 자기 앞에 모셔 있는 자기와 함께 자라난 어린 사람들과 의논하여

sentences.original_text: But Rehoboam did not agree with their advice
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 르호보암은 그들의 조언에 동의하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: Instead he talked to some younger men
sentences.korean_translation: 대신 그는 몇몇 젊은 남자들과 이야기했습니다

sentences.original_text: They had been his friends since they were young
and now they were his advisors
